name: lshp_577
description:
Unfolding of an lshp_577 sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix describes an L-shape thermal problem first documented by Alan George in 1978. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 577 nodes which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 300 frames
